name: KoBoToolbox
description: KoBoToolbox is a suite of tools for field data collection for use in challenging environments

SDGs.evidenceText: In Uganda, KoBoToolbox has been used to monitor deworming activities that are crucial to the health of school children
In South Sudan, KoBoToolbox has been used to map remote health facilities and track available services and medicine
In Niger, KoBoToolbox helps to plan and supervise infrastructure investments for refugees
KoBoToolbox was selected as the official data collection and coordination tool for the Recovery and Peacebuilding Process in the Central African Republic
